project.name: Ed & Sy Digital Agency Website
project.description: Website overhaul and pivot to full-service digital agency specializing in time-saving solutions

digital-agency.name: digital-agency
digital-agency.description: Website overhaul and pivot to full-service digital agency specializing in time-saving solutions

digital-agency.title: Strategic Planning & Brand Foundation
digital-agency.description: Establish digital agency positioning, messaging framework, and brand identity aligned with time-savings value proposition
digital-agency.details: Define the core messaging 'Get Your Time Back with AI-Powered Digital Solutions', establish target personas (Scale-Up Business Owners, Service-Based Entrepreneurs, Traditional Industry Owners), and create comprehensive brand guidelines including color palette (Deep blue #1a365d, Electric blue #4299e1, Warm orange #ed8936), typography (Inter fonts), and visual identity principles.
digital-agency.testStrategy: Validate messaging with target audience surveys and brand consistency audit across all materials

digital-agency.title: Content Strategy & Copywriting
digital-agency.description: Develop compelling copy for all website pages focusing on time-savings benefits and business results
digital-agency.details: Create homepage hero copy, service descriptions for Voice AI Assistants (flagship), Workflow Automation, Website Development, SEO Services, and Chatbots. Develop case studies format (Problem → Solution → Time Saved → Results), About page storytelling, and conversion-focused CTAs throughout the site.
digital-agency.testStrategy: A/B test key headlines and CTAs, measure time-on-page and conversion metrics

digital-agency.title: Website Design & Visual Identity
digital-agency.description: Create modern, professional website design that emphasizes time-savings and digital transformation
digital-agency.details: Design homepage with split-screen 'before/after' hero visual, create service cards highlighting time-savings, design interactive elements like animated counters and progress bars, develop mobile-first responsive layouts, and create visual elements including time-focused imagery (clocks, calendars, family moments).
digital-agency.testStrategy: User testing on mobile devices, performance testing for <3 second load times, accessibility audit

digital-agency.title: Homepage Development
digital-agency.description: Build conversion-optimized homepage with time-savings messaging and clear service positioning
digital-agency.details: Implement hero section with 'Get Your Time Back' messaging, create problem statement section addressing late nights/weekends work, build solution overview with 5 service cards (Voice AI prominent), add social proof section with time-savings testimonials, implement 'Ed & Sy Difference' section, and multiple consultation CTAs.
digital-agency.testStrategy: Heat mapping analysis, conversion rate tracking, page load speed verification

digital-agency.title: Voice AI Assistants Service Page
digital-agency.description: Develop flagship service page for Voice AI Assistants with detailed use cases and pricing
digital-agency.details: Create service page structure: Problem (repetitive phone calls) → Solution (24/7 AI handling) → Benefits (time savings, lead capture, professional image) → Use Cases (appointment booking, customer support, lead qualification) → Pricing tiers ($3K-$15K setup + monthly) → FAQ section → Consultation CTA.
digital-agency.testStrategy: Track consultation bookings from this page, measure engagement with pricing section
